00018         class vector  {
00019                 friend class GPRS::matrix;
00020 
00021                 private:
00022                         int size;
00023                         double *vec;
00024                         int range (int);
00025 
00026                 public:
00027                         vector (int);
00028                         vector (const double*, int);
00029                         vector (const vector&);
00030                         ~vector() {  delete vec; }
00031                         double& operator [](int i) { return vec[range(i)]; }
00032                         vector& operator=(const vector&);      //assignment u=v
00033                         vector& operator-=(const vector&);       //u -= v
00034                         vector& operator+=(const vector&);       //u += v
00035                         vector& operator*=(double );     // u *= c
00036                         vector& operator/=(double );     // u /= c
00037                         int getsize ()  { return size; }
00038                         void swap ( int, int );            //exchange two elements
00039 
00040                 friend vector operator-(const vector&);                  //-v
00041                 friend vector operator+(const vector&, const vector&);   //u+v
00042                 friend vector operator-(const vector&, const vector&);  //u-v
00043                 friend vector operator*(const vector&, double);         //v*c
00044                 friend vector operator*(double d, const vector& v)  { return v*d; }
00045                 friend vector operator/(const vector&, double);         //v/c
00046                 friend double scalar(const vector&, const vector&);     //u*v => c
00047                 //problem from gcc 4.1.2 the norm function, define outside the GPRS namespace
00048                 //friend double norm(const vector&);                      //||v||
00049                 friend double norminf(const vector&);                   //||v||inf
00050 
00051                 friend vector operator*(const matrix&, const vector&);  //friend functions
00052                 friend vector operator*(const vector&, const matrix&);  //with matrix class
00053                 friend matrix operator*(const vector&, const vector&);
00054                 friend matrix operator*(const matrix&, const matrix&);
00055                 friend double norm(const matrix&);
00056                 friend double norminf(const matrix&);
00057 
00058                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream &os, const vector& v); //output stream
00059                 friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream &is, vector& v);       //input stream
00060         };
00061 
00062         class matrix  {
00063                 private:
00064                         int numrows;
00065                         int numcols;
00066                         vector **mat;
00067                         int range (int);
00068 
00069                 public:
00070                         matrix (int, int);
00071                         matrix (int);
00072                         matrix (const matrix&);     //only for square class
00073                         ~matrix();
00074                         vector& operator[](int i) { return *mat[range(i)]; }  //get ith row
00075                         matrix& operator=(const matrix&);    //assignment
00076                         matrix& operator-=(const matrix&);   //m -= m1
00077                         matrix& operator+=(const matrix&);   //m += m1
00078                         matrix& operator*=(double );          //m *= c
00079                         matrix& operator/=(double );          //m /= c
00080                         int getnumrows()  { return numrows; }
00081                         int getnumcols()  { return numcols; }
00082                         int getsize();
00083                         void swap (int, int);              //exchange two rows
00084                         matrix transpose();                //transpose matrix
00085 
00086                 friend matrix operator-(const matrix&);                 //-m
00087                 friend matrix operator+(const matrix&, const matrix&);  //m1+m2
00088                 friend matrix operator-(const matrix&, const matrix&);  //m1-m2
00089                 friend matrix operator*(const matrix&, double);         //cm1
00090                 friend matrix operator*(double d, const matrix& v)  { return v*d; }
00091                 friend matrix operator/(const matrix&, double);        //m1/c
00092 
00093                 friend vector operator*(const matrix&, const vector&);  //m*v
00094                 friend vector operator*(const vector&, const matrix&);  //v*m
00095                 friend matrix operator*(const vector&, const vector&);  //v*u=>m
00096                 friend matrix operator*(const matrix&, const matrix&);  //m1*m2
00097                 friend double norm(const matrix&);                      //||m||
00098                 friend double norminf(const matrix&);                   //||m||inf
00099 
00100                 friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream&, const matrix&);    //outpt stream
00101                 friend std::istream& operator>>(std::istream&, matrix&);          //input stream
00102         };
00103 }
